org.trianacode.taskgraph

Interface Node

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    ParameterNode, RunnableNodeInterface
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ErrorNode, NodeImp, ParameterNodeImp, RunnableNode, RunnableParameterNode, TriggerNode

    public interface Node
    An interface for accessing the NodeCable associated with a Task.

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • getTask

        Task getTask()
        Returns:
        the task this node is attached to

      • addNodeListener

        void addNodeListener(NodeListener listener)
        Adds a node listener to this node.

      • removeNodeListener

        void removeNodeListener(NodeListener listener)
        Removes a node listener from this node.

      • getNodeIndex

        int getNodeIndex()
        Returns:
        the index of this node within its associated task (or -1 if disposed/not attached to a task)

      • getAbsoluteNodeIndex

        int getAbsoluteNodeIndex()
        This is a convience method to return the absolute positioning of a node.

        The absolute index of a data node is the same as its standard index. The absolute index of a parameter node is its standard index + the total number of data input/output nodes.

        Returns:
        the absolute index of this node within its associated task (or -1 if disposed/not attached to a task)

      • isConnected

        boolean isConnected()
        Returns:
        true if this node is connected to a cable

      • getCable

        Cable getCable()
        Returns:
        the cable this node is connected to

      • isInputNode

        boolean isInputNode()
        Returns:
        true if this node is an input node

      • isOutputNode

        boolean isOutputNode()
        Returns:
        true if this node is an output node

      • isDataNode

        boolean isDataNode()
        Returns:
        true if this node is a data node

      • isParameterNode

        boolean isParameterNode()
        Returns:
        true if this node is a parameter node

      • isOptional

        boolean isOptional()
        Returns:
        true if data is not required at this node for the task to run

      • isEssential

        boolean isEssential()
        Returns:
        true if data is essential at this node for the task to run

      • isEssentialIfConnected

        boolean isEssentialIfConnected()
        Returns:
        true if data is essential at this node only if the node is connected

      • isTopLevelNode

        boolean isTopLevelNode()
        Returns:
        true if this is a top level group node (i.e. it is attached directly to an actual (non-group) task)

      • getTopLevelNode

        Node getTopLevelNode()
        Returns:
        the top level parent node in the parent/child group node hierarchy

      • getTopLevelTask

        Task getTopLevelTask()
        Returns:
        the top level parent task in the parent/child group task hierarchy

      • isBottomLevelNode

        boolean isBottomLevelNode()
        Returns:
        true if this is a bottom level group node (i.e. it is attached directly to a actual cable)

      • getBottomLevelNode

        Node getBottomLevelNode()
        Returns:
        the bottom level parent node in the parent/child group node hierarchy

      • getBottomLevelTask

        Task getBottomLevelTask()
        Returns:
        the bottom level parent task in the parent/child group task hierarchy

      • getParentNode

        Node getParentNode()
        Returns:
        the parent group node for this node (null if top level)

      • getChildNode

        Node getChildNode()
        Returns:
        the child group node for this node (null if bottom level)

      • connect

        void connect(Cable cable)
        Connect a cable to this node. Should only be called from within cable.

      • disconnect

        void disconnect()
        Disconnect the cable from this node. Should only be called from within cable.

      • setParentNode

        void setParentNode(Node node)
        Sets the parent group node for this node

      • setChildNode

        void setChildNode(Node node)
        Sets the child group node for this node

      • dispose

        void dispose()
        Cleans-up when the node is no longer used

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
